newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Decision-makers consider CPI, wages - Costello.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Decision-makers consider CPI, wages - Costello.

text.p: Australian Treasurer Peter Costello said on Tuesday that economic decision makers would consider Australia's low inflation rate and wage restraint in making their decisions.
"We have the conjunciton of low inflation, we have wage restraint -- these are the matters that will be in the minds of decision-makers," Costello told parliament.
Costello did not specify which decision-makers, but Australia's Reserve Bank Board met on Tuesday amid widespread expectations it would decide to cut interest rates.
